# Half-Blood Extraction (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] ([[Polymorph Spells|polymorph]])

**Level:** [[5th Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 5]], [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5]], [[5th Level Druid Spells|Druid 5]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Witch Spells|Witch 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 9]], [[BoXM 9th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 9]], [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 hour

**Components:** V, S, M/DF (oils and poisons worth 3,000 gp)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Willing half-orc touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Race Guide, pg. 59

You transform the target [[Half-Orc|half-orc]] into a full-blooded [[Orc (Bestiary PF1)|orc]]. The target loses all of its half-orc racial traits and gains the orc racial traits.
